entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of drizzle changing to periods of snow this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and after midnight. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
